---
title: "Poisson-Results-Processor"
format: html
---

I will begin by loading three things.  

1. the data that were stored from creating the batch file.

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(jsonlite)
library(tidyverse)
load("rpois-7.5.RData")
```

2. The queries

```{r}
Pois7.5Call <- stream_in(file("rpois-7.5-Call-Revised-1211.jsonl"))
```

3. The Results

```{r}
Pois7.5Result <- stream_in(file("rpois-7.5-1211_output.jsonl"))
```

## Merge the call and the result

```{r}
Pois.7.5.OpenAI <- left_join(Pois7.5Call,Pois7.5Result)
Full.Pois.7.5 <- left_join(Pois7.5$params, Pois.7.5.OpenAI)
```

The file is saved as `Full.Pois.7.5.1211.RData`.

Put the result in the params file.

```{r}
Full.Pois.7.5$Outcome <- map_chr(Pois7.5$params$iter, function(x) { unlist(Pois7.5Result$response$body$choices[[x]][[2]][2]) })
table(Full.Pois.7.5$Outcome)
Full.Pois.7.5.1211 <- Full.Pois.7.5
```

```{r}
save(Full.Pois.7.5.1211, file="Full.Pois.7.5.1211.RData")
```
